title: Can someone please make this.
body:
So there is that old nursery rhyme about the old lady who swallowed a fly well i was thinking why not tahm.
there once was a Tahm that swalllowed a fly so he joins the league
to swallow a spider (elise)
to then swallow a bird (azir quinn anivia)
then swallow a cat (nidalee)
to swallow a dog (nasus)
to swallow a goat (soraka)
to swallow a cow (alistar)
then to swallow a horse (hecarim)
should make for a good laugh to see it in a video or comic.

replies.body: The goat will put up a good fight TAT
